title: Zhangzhou Urban Stay near Bihu Ecological Park
description: Overlooking lush wetlands and sprawling urban vistas, Crowne Plaza Zhangzhou, an IHG Hotel, is a gleaming pinnacle towering over this bustling city. Plunge into the crystal-clear pool before exploring rugged walking trails to discover the picturesque Yundong Caves. As evening falls, treat yourself to sumptuous Cantonese cuisine at Cai Feng Lou, a sophisticated cocktail at the Lobby Bar, or a tranquil sunset stroll past the verdant foliage and serene lakes of Bihu Ecological Park.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Zhangzhou, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 88 Shuixian Avenue, Longwen District, Zhangzhou 363005, China
